Main Page

0.0.4-124

Introduction

RainbruRPG is a 3D Role Playing Game project. It uses FOX toolkit, Ogre/CEGUI and Tinyxml.

Versions

The version are numbered x.y.z-b.
  • x represents the major version
  • y represents the minor version
  • z is the revision
  • b is the build number

Dependencies

To build RainbruRPG you need this libraries :
  • Fox toolkit v1.6 or 1.4
  • Ogre

The project also uses Tinyxml as build-in c++ sources. So you don't need to deal with it.

Signals/Slots mechanism

Some part of this projet use sigc++ for signal/slot mechanism. See http://libsigc.sourceforge.net/libsigc2/docs/manual/html/index.html for further informations.

In Qt based applications, I use the Qt signal/slot implementation.
